channel.title: Final Devo 2.4 Death help
channel.description: Hey everyone. I'm having trouble on my server, there's a glitch/bug where you kill somebody. When you kill them, they go into their death stage, but they never come out of it. They stay laying there. Even when they're teleported back to the spawn. You have to log out to fix it. Can someone please help me? I'm using Final Devolution 2.4

item.title: Final Devo 2.4 Death help
item.dc:creator: @Rat_racer550 Rat racer550
item.description:
@Rat_racer550 wrote:

Hey everyone. I’m having trouble on my server, there’s a glitch/bug where you kill somebody. When you kill them, they go into their death stage, but they never come out of it. They stay laying there. Even when they’re teleported back to the spawn. You have to log out to fix it. Can someone please help me? I’m using Final Devolution 2.4

Read full topic
